title: Lawsuit accuses Binance and CEO of unfairly triggering collapse of competitor FTX
description:
A class action lawsuit was filed on Oct. 2 in California federal court accusing cryptocurrency exchange Binance and its CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) of unfair competition and manipulating the market to trigger the downfall of rival exchange FTX. The lawsuit was filed by an FTX user who lost assets when FTX collapsed and filed for […]

The post Lawsuit accuses Binance and CEO of unfairly triggering collapse of competitor FTX appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Samsung Set to Launch Cloud Game Streaming Service with a Unique Mobile Focus
description: Samsung is gearing up to enter the cloud gaming arena with a distinct focus on mobile gaming. While industry giants like Amazon, Microsoft, and Nvidia target console and PC gamers, Samsung plans to offer a unique proposition to mobile gamers. title: Arbitrum Price Prediction 2023 – 2032: ARB breaks key barrier

title: Bitcoin ($BTC) Might Drop to $21.7K Due to Bearish Mood, so Investors Eye InQubeta ($QUBE) For Astronomical Gains
description: Bitcoin ($BTC) has maintained its position as a leader in the cryptocurrency market, even as numerous promising altcoins have emerged. title: Decentralized Triumph: Friend.Tech Protocol Hits 10,000 Ethereum (ETH) in Revenue
description: The social-fi platform, which is built on the Coinbase-backed Base layer two scaling solution, is geared towards capitalizing users’ network connections and has recorded over 9.2 million cumulative transactions.  Building on the success of Stealcam, Friend.Tech has recorded a total inflow of more than 214.9k ETH worth over $352 million thus showing its potential to [...]
